title: Merchandise Store Log In
body:
Help!

I can't log into the Merchandise Store and activate the quest for the PROJECT hoodie and time is running out. I made a support ticket a week ago and no reply. I fear I am going to miss out. What do?

replies.body: Hi, I just wanted to check back in with you. Have you received any updates to your ticket yet?
Hey I just saw this for some reason and it all worked out thanks for your help :D
